patterns: What kinds of items are there?
responses:
We have 
ESPRESSO- BASED BEVERAGES
 1.Caffe Latte  2.Cappuccino  3.Double Short Latte  4.Single Tall  5.Butterscotch Latte  6.Cafe Mocha  7.Cafe Americano  8.Cafe Breve  9.Macchiato Con Pana

HOT ALTERNATIVES TO COFFEE
 1.Hot Chocolate  2.White Hot Chocolate  3.Red Steamer  4.Butterscotch Steamer  5.Spiced Chai Steamer  6.Malted Carob Steamer  7.Loose-Leaf Tea

FREEZES AND ICED DRINKS
 1.Choc-mint Freeze  2.Seattle Freeze 3.Mocha Freeze  4.Butterscotch Freeze  5.Lemon&Ginger Freeze  6.Berry Freeze  7.Iced Tea  8.Mint Fudge

And also some new  Morsels
